name: Double Or Die!
description:
Fast paced action - avoid the obstacles on BOTH SIDES of the screen!

Can your brain handle two sides at the same time? Test your reactions as the obstacles speed up over time - squeeze through the gaps that get smaller and smaller!

Three powerups are available:

- Boosters give a 10 second super start
- Shields give you invincibility for 5 seconds on one side (press and hold for one second to activate)
- Continues let you carry on after one side hits an obstacle - but only for another 10 seconds

More powerups can be bought with coins from the in-game store.
